Item ID1539

Steel nails are nails made with a steel bar on an anvil with a hammer in the player's inventory, requiring 34 Smithing, yielding 15 steel nails and granting 37.5 Smithing experience per bar.

These nails are the only nails that non-members can create, as they are used in the Dragon Slayer I quest. Steel nails are tradeable, can be bought at the sawmill operator for 3 coins each.

Members can use steel nails to construct certain types of wooden furniture. With 56 Construction, five steel nails can be used along with two planks to repair broken bridges in the Hallowed Sepulchre, granting 150 Construction experience; without a hallowed hammer in the player's inventory, there is a chance of failing to repair the bridge and breaking nails in the process. With 33 Fletching, they can be used on flighted ogre arrows to create steel brutal arrows, granting 5.1 Fletching experience per arrow. With 62 Crafting, fifteen steel nails can be used with a maple shield and two pieces of green dragon leather to craft a green d'hide shield, granting 124 Crafting experience per shield.

Quests[edit | edit source]

Besides just construction, steel nails are also necessary to complete a few quests.

  • 10 steel nails are used in the Cold War quest.
  • 60 steel nails are used in the Horror from the Deep quest.
  • 225 steel nails are used in the In Search of the Myreque quest.
  • 90 steel nails are used in the Dragon Slayer I quest.

[[File:Steel nails detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Steel nails''' are [[nails]] made with a [[steel bar]] on an [[anvil]] with a hammer in the player's [[inventory]], requiring 34 [[Smithing]], yielding 15 steel nails and granting 37.5 Smithing experience per bar.

These nails are the only nails that non-members can create, as they are used in the [[Dragon Slayer I]] quest. Steel nails are tradeable, can be bought at the [[sawmill operator]] for {{NoCoins|3}} [[coins]] each.

[[Members]] can use steel nails to [[construct]] certain types of wooden [[furniture]]. With 56 [[Construction]], five steel nails can be used along with two [[planks]] to repair broken bridges in the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]], granting 150 Construction experience; without a [[hallowed hammer]] in the player's inventory, there is a chance of failing to repair the bridge and breaking nails in the process. With 33 [[Fletching]], they can be used on [[flighted ogre arrow]]s to create [[steel brutal]] arrows, granting 5.1 Fletching experience per arrow. With 62 [[Crafting]], fifteen steel nails can be used with a [[maple shield]] and two pieces of [[green dragon leather]] to craft a [[green d'hide shield]], granting 124 Crafting experience per shield.
